e="preserve">Robert Adol'fovich Minlos (; 28 February 1931 – 9 January 2018) was a Soviet and Russian mathematician. He was born in Moscow. Minlos was known for his works to probability theory and mathematical physics. His theorem on the extension of cylindrical measures to Radon measures on the continuous dual of a nuclear space is of fundamental importance in the theory of generalized random processes.
Minlos died on 9 January 2018 in Moscow at the age of 86.
